seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: What Is Tapping?
body:
Emotional Freedom Techniques, referred to as EFT, and commonly called ‘Tapping’ is a powerful way to deal with unresolved issues, transform beliefs, and reprogram yourself for heightened happiness, health, abundance, and success. In this episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton, PhD, gives an in-depth introduction to tapping and how it can work for you. 

In this lesson you will discover:
- How Tapping came into practice and why it is rapidly increasing in popularity.
- The simple movements and scripts behind the practice.
- How Tapping produces profound effects on the mind and body.
- Why this is becoming the go-to modality for holistic practitioners.
teaser: In this episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton, PhD, gives an in-depth introduction to Tapping and how it can work for you.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: The Science Behind Tapping
body:
As a researcher and clinical psychologist, Dr. Peta Stapleton has always been interested in scientific evidence. She has witnessed the power of Tapping first-hand, but to get it officially recognized as a modality she knew she had to present it in a methodical way. Tapping has formed the core of her research, and in this episode, she shares how it works from a physiological level.

In this lesson you will discover:

- Research that has impacted the field of Tapping.
- Why Tapping is such a proven, effective method of self-healing.
- Scientific explanations of how Tapping impacts the mind and the body.
- The wide range of conditions and scenarios that benefit from Tapping.
teaser: Dr. Peta Stapleton witnessed the power of Tapping first-hand, but to get it officially recognized as a modality she knew she had to present it in a methodical way. Tapping has formed the core of her research, and in this episode, she shares how it works from a physiological level.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Tapping for Stress & Worry
body:
Stress is a condition that is having profound effects on us as individuals and on greater society. It has been suggested that stress may even be the mental health epidemic of the 21st Century. Much of the scientific research behind tapping has examined stress, depression, and PTSD, and the immediate results have been profound. In our first script, Dr. Peta Stapleton shows you how tapping can be used in moments of heightened stress, and to work through any mental health issues triggered by stress.

In this lesson you will discover:

- Why Tapping has such a profound effect on both short-term and long-term stress.
- How this modality has changed the lives of those living with anxiety.
- Simple scripts you can use to alleviate stress and worry in a matter of minutes.
teaser: Dr. Peta Stapleton shows you how tapping can be used in moments of heightened stress, and to work through any mental health issues triggered by stress.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Overcoming Insomnia
body:
Trouble with sleep is more common than you would think, and it’s not just difficulty getting to sleep. Insomnia can manifest itself in different ways; be it restless sleep, sluggish waking, tossing and turning throughout the night… This condition looks different on everyone, but a bad sleep can impact every area of our life. Dr. Peta Stapleton’s simple tapping script for insomnia will send you to blissful sleep in moments.

In this lesson you will discover:

- How insomnia manifests itself in different ways.
- Why getting a night of good sleep is crucial to your health.
- Simple scripts you can use to overcome insomnia and get a good night’s sleep.
teaser: Bad sleep can impact every area of our life. Dr. Peta Stapleton’s simple tapping script for insomnia will send you to blissful sleep in moments.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Clearing Limiting Beliefs
body:
The only thing that prevents us from obtaining our desires in life is our limiting beliefs. Whether you’ve dreamed of running a marathon, owning your own company, or finding your soulmate, all that is stopping you exists within your mind. With a simple tapping script, you can discover where these limiting beliefs arise from and how you can move past them to live the life you desire.

In this lesson you will discover:

- Why limiting beliefs and self-sabotage are the only things holding you back from making your dreams your reality.
- How beliefs can form from an emotion or an experience, and why addressing this story is important to removing them.
- Easy and profound scripts you can use and adapt to clear your limiting beliefs and rid yourself of self-sabotage for once and for all.
teaser: The only thing that prevents us from obtaining our desires in life is our limiting beliefs. With a simple tapping script, you can discover where these limiting beliefs arise from and how you can move past them to live the life you desire.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Tapping for Abundance
body:
Abundance means something different for everyone. Some interpret it as financial wealth, others see it as a life rich in people and possessions. However you see abundance for you, it can be made possible by tapping on it. Dr. Peta Stapleton takes us back to the science of energy within the universe and guides us to use tapping to determine our own self-worth. Ask your boss for that pay rise, attract the people you want into your life. Abundance is within reach.

In this lesson you will discover:

- How the only thing holding you back from abundance is your beliefs around it.
- Why intentions become easier to achieve when you say them aloud.
- Ways to manifest your desires by changing your mindset.
- Tapping scripts you can use for unlocking abundance and setting successful intentions.
teaser: However you see abundance for you, it can be made possible by tapping on it. Dr. Peta Stapleton takes us back to the science of energy within the universe and guides us to use tapping to determine our own self-worth.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Eliminating Food Cravings
body:
For many struggling with weight loss, eliminating food cravings can be at the core of your blockages. Cravings for certain foods are less about hunger, and more about the emotional association, the comfort we find within each bite, and the fear of wastage. In this episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton will introduce you to a tapping script she has used on a much-loved cookie but can be adapted for any food that has a hold over you.

In this lesson you will discover:

- How weight loss can be triggered through a change of mindset.
- Why barriers in our weight-loss journey can be cravings, comfort, a childhood story, or even an inherent fear of throwing it away.
- Ways to remove the meaning and reliance we place on certain foods.
- A simple tapping script you can use to address food cravings and concerns.
teaser: For many struggling with weight loss, eliminating food cravings can be at the core of your blockages. In this episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton will introduce you to a tapping script she has used on a much-loved cookie but can be adapted for any food that has a hold over you.

seriesTitle: Everyday Tapping: A Proven Stress Management Technique
title: Commonly Asked Questions About Tapping
body:
There is an abundance of opportunity that lies ahead for you with this new, self-healing tool, but any doubts you may have about your practice could prevent you from making the changes you crave. In our final episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton answers some of your most commonly asked questions by ‘tappers’ of any experience level.

In this lesson you will discover:

- Why we tap on negative statements instead of positive affirmations.
- Whether it matters what hand you use to tap.
- How you can adapt the Tapping process for children and teens.
- Discreet ways of Tapping you can use in any environment.
teaser: In our final episode, Dr. Peta Stapleton answers some of your most commonly asked questions by ‘tappers’ of any experience level.
